author: Monit Khanna
title: What Is Hantavirus, And How Does It Spread: Everything You Need To Know With Precautions
description: We're nowhere close to containing the novel coronavirus and now China has seen its first death from Hantavirus. But what exactly is this Hantavirus? How does it contract and should we be freaking out?
content:
The COVID-19 coronavirus that originated from a market in Wuhan, Hubei Province in China has today infected over 3 lakh people globally and claimed lives of over 14,000. 
Reuters
